task.title: Adjusting the heat - Saloon
task.shortdesc: Use the heater thermostat dial to adjust the temperature of the heater.

context.p: The thermostat dial is located on the left of the control panel.

step.cmd: The first few degrees of movement of the switch operate the heater motor at maximum speed.
Turn the switch knob further to gradually reduce the speed of the blower to regulate the heating of the vehicle interior.
